name: MeasureIdentifierType
title: Measure Identifier Type Codes
description: Identifier types for a measure (e.g. version-independent, version-specific, short-name, endorser, publisher)

concept.definition: The version independent globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
The version specific globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
The short name identifier for the measure (e.g. CMS104v8).
The version-independent endorser identifier for the measure (e.g. 0002).
The version-independent publisher identifier for the measure (e.g. 104).
